item.title: How do i rename the emotes to commands tabs
item.dc:creator: @Austin2 -Austin-
item.description:
@Austin2 wrote:

dont do that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2008, 08:31:08 PM[/size][hr]pretend ur changing “barrow” on emotes
ctrl “barrow” and ur see one with tele cords that says } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by -Austin- } else { teleportToX = 3233; teleportToY = 9315; sendMessage("You teleport to the Portal Zone!!"); } mine are dif cords cuz thats were my portal zone is. but ur see soemthing like that. and replace the cords but not the “barrow” then go into ur text menu and do ctrl + f and replace it with the place u made it

Read full topic

item.title: How do i rename the emotes to commands tabs
item.dc:creator: @Master_Guru Master Guru
item.description:
@Master_Guru wrote:

Go to client.java. Then, search a emote that already is in Emote Tab. Now change what the name is you can also change the Coords it teleports you to. You may also change the Emote they do when you click it.

Read full topic
